description:
update_instance() checks if kwargs has one of updatable_fields and if yes - performs an update using _all_ arguments.

Seems like instead of 
            self.compute_api.update(context, instance_id=instance_id, **kwargs)
it should call
            self.compute_api.update(context, instance_id=instance_id, **changes)
title: update_instance may update fields other than display_name/display_description
